summary.span: 控制对共享属性组的访问。

span.span: Controls access to shared property groups.

summary.span: 通过给定的信息查找或创建属性组。

span.span: Finds or creates a property group with the given information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`dwIsoMode`，而是在 get 和 set 操作，你可以选择将锁定属性通过指定原子，或若要锁定在持续时间内的方法的属性，调用通过指定。Using `dwIsoMode`, during get and set operations, you can either choose to make locking properties atomic by specifying , or to lock properties over the duration of the method call by specifying . > [!CAUTION] > 不要使用时在构造函数中创建属性组，这样做可能会导致死锁。Do not use when creating a property group in a constructor, doing so can result in a deadlock. 如果发布模式下为指定`dwRelMode`是，指定的属性`name`进程的生存期内都处于活动状态。If the release mode specified for `dwRelMode` is , the property specified by `name` is held alive for the lifetime of the process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`CreatePropertyGroup`方法以创建组管理器的共享的属性。The following code example shows how to use the `CreatePropertyGroup` method to create a shared property group manager. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties/CPP/receiptcounterclass.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties/CS/receiptcounterclass.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_SharedProperties/VB/receiptcounterclass.vb#2)]
